resources.string: 系统会依据该数据记圈
Eliminare questa attività? Non potrai recuperarla una volta cancellata.
La distanza automatica è uguale alla dimensione della vasca. Puoi cambiarla nelle impostazioni del nuoto.
Il GPS verrà spento tra un minuto per inattività.
Questo allenamento mantiene la tua forma cadiorespiratoria.
Fuori del %1$s dalla zona di allerta
More records, please go to the Amazfit Watch App
Usa il pulsante inferiore per terminare
Please add interval workouts in Amazfit Watch App and sync to this watch
Durante attività con obbiettivi le altre impostazioni non saranno attive.
Attività troppo breve, non può essere salvata. Continuare?
Una giocata con pochi colpi non può essere registrata. Continuare?
Meno di un viaggio non può essere salvato, continuare?
"Make sure to wear the watch on the wrist of the hand holding the racket"
Available space of the watch is too small, which may affect saving of the movement. Delete some imported files ASAP.
Current available space for the watch is less than the minimum required for motion (2MB). Delete some of the imported files and start moving.
Calibration with a mileage greater than 0.5 km allows the watch to learn your running habits and make the running mileage more accurate.
The calibration value %1$s is quite different from the measured value %2$s. Is the calibration confirmed?

"1. Calibration with a mileage greater than 0.5 km allows the watch to learn your running habits and make the running mileage more accurate. 2. If you have performed multiple calibrations but are still not satisfied with the mileage results, you can recalibrate. 3. Recalibration will delete all previous calibration records."
Inserire le info personali oppure i dati saranno imprecisi
"Please use the watch for a week first. We will evaluate your training load for 7 days"
"Training intensity is too high, Please avoid excessive training."
The watch will recommend the best method of training for you by combining your past performance.
This training has no effect on improving aerobic capacity.
The training effect is weak. This intensity is helpful for improving training tolerance and is also suitable for post-exercise recovery training.
The training effect is moderate, which is helpful to maintain aerobic capacity.
The training effect is good, which is helpful to improve aerobic capacity.
The training effect is excellent, which can effectively improve cardiorespiratory capacity and aerobic capacity.
The training intensity has exceeded the body load. Non-professional personnel shall do well in recovery after training.
Questa è una buona andatura. Qualche minuto in più per mantenerti in forma。
Recovery exercises can be performed to ease the damage to the body before it is fully recovered

What’s this？
         Maximum oxygen uptake (VO2max) refers to the oxygen uptake when the human body is performing exercise under maximum intensity, and it is an important index to the aerobic capacity. As one of the important reference data for endurance athletes, high maximal oxygen uptake is the foundation of high aerobic capacity.
         Maximum oxygen uptake is relatively individualized, with different reference standards for different gender and age. The watch will evaluate your athletic ability based on your personal information, heart rate and speed generated during training, and will change with your athletic ability. Of course, everyone has a ceiling of their own maximum oxygen uptake, which depends the individual body.
How to obtain it？
         1. Enter accurate personal information in the Amazfit watch App;
         2. Wear the watch for at least 10 minutes of outdoor running, and to generate heart rate values and reach the maximum heart rate of 75%;
         3. After running, you can check your current maximum oxygen uptake level through the training record function of the watch or personal status page in the Amazfit watch App.
        (More instructions on maximum oxygen uptake can be found in the help page of the Amazfit watch App.)

What’s this？
         Training effect (hereinafter referred to as TE) is an index to measure the improvement effect of one training to aerobic capacity. TE score will continuously accumulate staring with 0.0 as you starting training with the watch. The score interval is 0.0-5.0, with different score interval representing different effects. The higher the score is, the higher the training intensity is, and the greater the stress on the body. However, it also means that the effect of this training is better. Of course, when TE reaches 5.0, you shall pay attention to whether the body is overloaded.
How to obtain it？
         The TE score may be evaluated based on your personal information, heart rate and speed during training. A lower TE score does not mean that you have a problem with your training, and only means that this training is relatively easy and has no significant effect on improving your aerobic capacity (for example, you jog for an hour, the TE score will still be low).
         The watch will present the TE score after the training and provide relevant evaluation or suggestions. Meanwhile, it also provides real-time TE for the runners who need to adjust their status during running.
        (More instructions on TE can be found in the help page of the Amazfit watch App.)

The watch will calculate the corresponding training load score based on the EPOC (excess post exercise oxygen consumption) you have generated in the past 7 days, so as to evaluate your amount of exercise. You can adjust your next training schedule based on recommendations in interval your score is in.
        (More instructions on training load can be found in the help page of the Amazfit watch App.)

The watch will recommend training target for you based on your recent performance.
         If real-time guidance is turned on in the training setting, the watch will prompt you how to adjust your speed and heart rate to better achieve the target when you set the training effect target or use the recommended target.
         (More instructions can be found in the help page of the Amazfit watch App.)

What’s this？
         Runners may in good or bad situation during running. Performance status helps to quantify your each running state.
How to use it？
         The watch will automatically evaluate your current performance status after 6 minutes since running. A positive value represents good status. Therefore, you are more likely to do well in running or racing. When it is a negative value, it is recommended not to run at high intensity and not to force yourself to run well.
         At the end of each running, you can analyze the run by looking at the score per mile in the performance chart .
        (More instructions on performance status can be found in the help page of the Amazfit watch App.)

The watch will recommend the time for full recovery for each training based on the running results, which is proportional to the training intensity. Runners are not advised to have high-intensity training during recovery, and can do some restorative training to help the body recover.
        (More instructions on recovery time can be found in the help page of the Amazfit watch App.)
La funzione sport all\'aperto utilizzerà questa traccia per la navigazione. Se inutile, chiudi per uscire
Per assicurare la miglior precisione, iniziare l\'esercizio esattamente dal punto di partenza della traccia
